assessment_item.subject: Social Studies
assessment_item.title: ಮೂರನೆ ಮೈಸೂರು ಯುದ್ಧಕ್ಕೆ ತತ್‍ಕ್ಷಣದ ಕಾರಣ
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಮೂರನೆ ಮೈಸೂರು ಯುದ್ಧಕ್ಕೆ ತತ್‍ಕ್ಷಣದ ಕಾರಣ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಇಂಗ್ಲೀಷರು ಮಾಹೆ ವಶಪಡಿಸಿ ಕೊಂಡದ್ದು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3694"},{"text":"

ಟಿಪ್ಪು ತಿರುವಾಂಕೂರಿನ ಮೇಲೆ ದಾಳಿ ಮಾಡಿದ್ದು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:3695"},{"text":"

ಇಂಗ್ಲೀಷರು ಹೈದರಾಲಿ ಮೇಲೆ ಆಕ್ರಮಣ ಮಾಡಿದ್ದು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3705"},{"text":"

ಟಿಪ್ಪು ಸಹಾಯಕ ಸೈನ್ಯ ಪದ್ಧತಿ ತಿರಸ್ಕರಿಸಿದ್ದು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3710"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಮೂರನೆ ಮೈಸೂರು ಯುದ್ಧಕ್ಕೆ ತತ್‍ಕ್ಷಣದ ಕಾರಣ ","title":"ಮೂರನೆ ಮೈಸೂರು ಯುದ್ಧಕ್ಕೆ ತತ್‍ಕ್ಷಣದ ಕಾರಣ ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
assessment_item.name: ಮೂರನೆ ಮೈಸೂರು ಯುದ್ಧಕ್ಕೆ ತತ್‍ಕ್ಷಣದ ಕಾರಣ
